scripts.build:client: npm run create:dirs && (npm run compile:jade && r.js -o build-debug.js)
scripts.preverticle: npm run compile:java && cp src/main/resources/webelexis-core.js dist && cp cfglocal.json dist
scripts.verticle: cd dist && vertx run webelexis-core.js -conf cfglocal.json
scripts.prebuild:module: npm run clean && vertx uninstall ch-webelexis~${npm_package_name}~${npm_package_version} && npm run build:client && npm run preverticle && cp src/main/resources/mod.json dist
scripts.build:jar: npm run build:module && cd .. && vertx fatjar ch.webelexis~${npm_package_name}~${npm_package_version}
scripts.start: npm run build:client && npm run verticle
